import Form from './styles/Form'; import useForm from '../lib/useForm'; import DisplayError from './ErrorMessage'; export default function SignIn() { const { inputs, handleChange, resetForm } = useForm({ email: '', password: '', }); const [createProduct, { data, error, loading }] = useMutation( CREATE_PRODUCT_MUTATION, { variables: inputs, refetchQueries: [{ query: ALL_PRODUCTS_QUERY }], } ); return (
